name: Colonoscopy
title: Colonoscopy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a colonoscopy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a screening or diagnostic colonoscopy.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
